content: this pattern is for the atom 12 crochet square i designed this crochet square for the moogly crochet along 2024 finished size 12 x 12 square skill level intermediate to advanced yarn caron one pound 100% acrylic 454g / 16 oz 742m / 812 yds colors cream and aqua free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/atom-crochet-square/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
